items.title: how to use same rabbitmq queue in different java microservice
items.body:
I am new here for rabbitmq,my question is how can we use same queue for different consumer or different microservices. In my project i have centralise rabbitmq and created two different spring boot applications.In that i am calling one service in first application in that its creating one queue in rabbitmq and also receiving message from that queue but in my second application its not receiving that message from queue. Can anybuddy tell me how can i call or use one queue in two different applications.

here is my code for first application. Controller:

@RestController
@RequestMapping(value = "/candidate-corpus/")

public class RabbitMQWebController {

@Autowired
RabbitMQSender rabbitMQSender;

@Autowired
RabbitMQReceiver rabbitMQReceiver;

@GetMapping(value = "/updater")
public String producer(@RequestParam("candName") String 
 candName,@RequestParam("candId") String candId) {

    Candidate candidate=new Candidate();
    candidate.setCandId(candId);
    candidate.setCandName(candName);
    rabbitMQSender.send(candidate);
    //rabbitMQReceiver.recievedMessage(emp);

    return "Message sent to the RabbitMQ Corpus Successfully";
 }

Config file:

@Configuration
public class RabbitMQConfig {

@Value("${rabbitmqqueuelist.queue}")
String queueName;

@Value("${rabbitmqqueuelist.exchange}")
String exchange;

@Value("${rabbitmqqueuelist.routing-key}")
private String routingkey;

@Bean
Queue candidateUpdater1() {
    return new Queue(queueName, false);
}

@Bean
FanoutExchange xyz() {
    return new FanoutExchange(exchange);
}

@Bean
Binding binding(Queue queue, FanoutExchange exchange) {
    return BindingBuilder.bind(queue).to(exchange);
}

@Bean
public MessageConverter jsonMessageConverter() {
    return new Jackson2JsonMessageConverter();
}

@Bean
public AmqpTemplate rabbitTemplate(ConnectionFactory 
connectionFactory) {
    final RabbitTemplate rabbitTemplate = new 
 RabbitTemplate(connectionFactory);
    rabbitTemplate.setMessageConverter(jsonMessageConverter());
    return rabbitTemplate;
}

@Bean
public RabbitMQReceiver receiver() { return new RabbitMQReceiver();}

}

RabbitMqSender.java

@Service
public class RabbitMQSender {

@Autowired
private AmqpTemplate rabbitTemplate;

@Value("${rabbitmqqueuelist.exchange}")
private String exchange;

@Value("${rabbitmqqueuelist.routing-key}")
private String routingkey;

public void send(Candidate cand) {
    rabbitTemplate.convertAndSend(exchange, routingkey, cand);
    System.out.println("exchange kye"+exchange);
    System.out.println("routing key"+routingkey);
    System.out.println("cand obj. "+cand);

}
}

RabbitMq Receiver:

public class RabbitMQReceiver {

@Autowired
private AmqpTemplate rabbitTemplate;

@Value("${rabbitmqqueuelist.exchange}")
private String exchange;

@Value("${rabbitmqqueuelist.routing-key}")
private String routingkey;

@RabbitListener(queues = "${rabbitmqqueuelist.queue}")
public void recievedMessage(Candidate obj) {

  // Object obj1 = rabbitTemplate.receiveAndConvert();

    System.out.println("-----------"+obj.toString());
    System.out.println("Recieved Message: " + obj.getCandName());
    System.out.println("Recieved Message: " + obj.getCandId());
 }
}

here is application.yml file

  rabbitmq:
  host: localhost
  port: 15672
  username: guest
  password: guest

 rabbitmqqueuelist.exchange: xyz
 rabbitmqqueuelist.routing-key: candidateUpdater
 rabbitmqqueuelist.queue: candidateUpdater1

so above is my first application code.in that i am sending and receiving the data from queue but while i am running my second application in that its not receiving.Can anyone guide me how can i achieve that.

Note:for second application i have used same code which given above.

I already go through the official website but not able to understand, thats why i asked here

Thank you.

I'm running a VB.Net Console application that has a main menu system. when selection option 1 it goes through the accuracy option menu, and sets that value then returns you to the main menu

when you go back into the option 1 to see if it has set that value, the value is resent to 0 and not the entered value


    Public Class Coursework
    	Public Shared Sub Main()
            Console.Title = “CS0002 - Ali Bachar 1708720” 'Creates the title for the window'
            MainMenu
            Dim selection As String = "" 
            While selection <> "EXIT" 
                selection = (Console.ReadLine()).ToUpper()
                If selection = "1" Then
                    AccuracyOption()
                Else If selection = "2" Then
    
                Else IF selection = "3" Then
    
                Else IF selection = "4" Then 
    
                Else If selection = "5" Then
    
                Else If selection = "EXIT" or "6" Then 
                    environment.Exit(0)
                Else 
                    Console.Writeline("NOT VALID INPUT! Try Again")
                    System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(500)
                    Console.Clear
                    MainMenu
                End If
            End While
    	End Sub
        
        Public Shared Sub MainMenu()
            Console.WriteLine("CS002 Coursework - Ali Bachar 1708720") 'Creates the in terminal Title for the main Menue'
            Console.WriteLine("--------------------------------------------------------------------------------")
            Console.WriteLine(environment.Newline + "1) Accuracy Option")
            Console.WriteLine("2) Quadratic Equation")
            Console.WriteLine("3) Monte-Carlo Integration")
            Console.WriteLine("4) Prime Decision")
            Console.WriteLine("5) Help")
            Console.WriteLine("6) Exit")
            Console.WriteLine(environment.Newline + "Please choose and option and hit return ")
    
            End Sub
       Public Shared Sub AccuracyOption() 
            Dim accuracyValue As Integer 
            Dim entervalue As String
            Console.Clear
            Console.WriteLine("Accuracy Option")
            Console.WriteLine("--------------------------------------------------------------------------------")
            Console.WriteLine(environment.Newline +"This is the Accuracy value for all mathematic values (Decimal Places)")
            Console.WriteLine("The current Value is set at: " & accuracyValue)
            Console.WriteLine(environment.Newline + "Please enter a new accuracy value or back to return to the main menu")
            entervalue = Console.ReadLine().ToUpper
            If entervalue = "BACK" Then
            Console.Clear()
            MainMenu
            Else 
                accuracyValue = entervalue
                Console.Writeline("The new Accuracy Value is " & accuracyValue )
                System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(500)
                console.Clear
                MainMenu
    
            End If
       End Sub
    
    End Class.

I'm not sure why this is occurring and how to combat it

[Visual Representation ][1]


  [1]: https://i.stack.imgur.com/dpl5p.jpg
items.title: Variable Value Resets in VB
items.body:
I'm running a VB.Net Console application that has a main menu system. when selection option 1 it goes through the accuracy option menu, and sets that value then returns you to the main menu

when you go back into the option 1 to see if it has set that value, the value is resent to 0 and not the entered value

Public Class Coursework
    Public Shared Sub Main()
        Console.Title = “CS0002 - Ali Bachar 1708720” 'Creates the title for the window'
        MainMenu
        Dim selection As String = "" 
        While selection <> "EXIT" 
            selection = (Console.ReadLine()).ToUpper()
            If selection = "1" Then
                AccuracyOption()
            Else If selection = "2" Then

            Else IF selection = "3" Then

            Else IF selection = "4" Then 

            Else If selection = "5" Then

            Else If selection = "EXIT" or "6" Then 
                environment.Exit(0)
            Else 
                Console.Writeline("NOT VALID INPUT! Try Again")
                System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(500)
                Console.Clear
                MainMenu
            End If
        End While
    End Sub

    Public Shared Sub MainMenu()
        Console.WriteLine("CS002 Coursework - Ali Bachar 1708720") 'Creates the in terminal Title for the main Menue'
        Console.WriteLine("--------------------------------------------------------------------------------")
        Console.WriteLine(environment.Newline + "1) Accuracy Option")
        Console.WriteLine("2) Quadratic Equation")
        Console.WriteLine("3) Monte-Carlo Integration")
        Console.WriteLine("4) Prime Decision")
        Console.WriteLine("5) Help")

        Console.WriteLine(environment.Newline + "Please choose and option and hit return ")

        End Sub
   Public Shared Sub AccuracyOption()

        Dim entervalue As String

        Console.WriteLine("Accuracy Option")
        Console.WriteLine("--------------------------------------------------------------------------------")
        Console.WriteLine(environment.Newline +"This is the Accuracy value for all mathematic values (Decimal Places)")
        Console.WriteLine("The current Value is set at: " & accuracyValue)
        Console.WriteLine(environment.Newline + "Please enter a new accuracy value or back to return to the main menu")
        entervalue = Console.ReadLine().ToUpper
        If entervalue = "BACK" Then
        Console.Clear()
        MainMenu
        Else 
            accuracyValue = entervalue
            Console.Writeline("The new Accuracy Value is " & accuracyValue )
            System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(500)
            console.Clear
            MainMenu

        End If
   End Sub

End Class.

I'm not sure why this is occurring and how to combat it

Visual Representation

I have the following table:

My task is: ***for each event selected item , report the event id along with the total unit count for all items for that event.***

I tried the following:

 

     SELECT S.ITEMNO,S.EVENTID, S.ROOMID, T.TOTAL                          
     FROM SELECTEDITEM S JOIN                                              
                        (SELECT EVENTID, SUM(UNIT_COUNT) AS TOTAL          
                        FROM SELECTEDITEM                                  
                        GROUP BY EVENTID) AS T                             
                        ON S.ITEMNO=T.ITEMNO;                              
    ---------+---------+---------+---------+---------+---------+---------+---------
    DSNT408I SQLCODE = -206, ERROR:  T.ITEMNO IS NOT VALID IN THE CONTEXT WHERE IT 
             IS USED                                                               

Why is it not working? Can I join an existing table with one that has been just generated?


  [1]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/u9Fix.png
items.title: SQL. How to join an existing table with the one that has been just generated (DB2)?
items.body:
I have the following table:

My task is: for each event selected item , report the event id along with the total unit count for all items for that event.

I tried the following:

 SELECT S.ITEMNO,S.EVENTID, S.ROOMID, T.TOTAL                          
 FROM SELECTEDITEM S JOIN                                              
                    (SELECT EVENTID, SUM(UNIT_COUNT) AS TOTAL          
                    FROM SELECTEDITEM                                  
                    GROUP BY EVENTID) AS T                             
                    ON S.ITEMNO=T.ITEMNO;                              
---------+---------+---------+---------+---------+---------+---------+---------
DSNT408I SQLCODE = -206, ERROR:  T.ITEMNO IS NOT VALID IN THE CONTEXT WHERE IT 
         IS USED

Why is it not working? Can I join an existing table with one that has been just generated?

items.body_markdown:
I have a oneshot service which I want to start at boot time on rhel 7.4.

I understand that `"chkconfig --add"` is one way to achieve this. But it requires the startup script to be present in 

> /etc/init.d directory

For non-oneshot services, I understand that the "Restart=" option could be used in the systemd service file.

If I try to set `Restart=always` for a oneshot service, it doesn't work. Oneshot service needs `"Restart=no"`.

Is there any way I can start a oneshot service upon boot without having the script in 

> /etc/init.d directory
items.title: Automatically starting oneshot service on bootup
items.body:
I have a oneshot service which I want to start at boot time on rhel 7.4.

I understand that "chkconfig --add" is one way to achieve this. But it requires the startup script to be present in

/etc/init.d directory

For non-oneshot services, I understand that the "Restart=" option could be used in the systemd service file.

If I try to set Restart=always for a oneshot service, it doesn't work. Oneshot service needs "Restart=no".

Is there any way I can start a oneshot service upon boot without having the script in

/etc/init.d directory

items.title: Get description when clicked on list item
items.body:
So, i have a table, consisting of one tr and two td`s. In one td there is a list of users, in a second one, there is description, for each one.

      <tr>
        <td className='influencers'>
          <ul className='influencers-list'>
            {this.state.influencers.map(influencer =>
              <li key = {influencer.id}
                  className = 'influencers-list-item'
                  onClick={this.handleActive}
                  id = {influencer.id}>
                <p className='influencers-list-name'>{influencer.name}</p>
                <p className='influencers-list-data'>{influencer.created_at}</p>
                <p className='influencers-list-notes' >Notes</p>
              </li>)}
          </ul>
        </td>
        <td>
          <div className = {`to-dont-list__description`}>
            {this.state.influencers.map(influencer =>
              <div key = {influencer.id}  id={influencer.id}>
                <div>
                  <p className = 'to-dont-list__data'>{influencer.created_at}</p>
                  <img src = {influencer.image} className = 'to-dont-list__img'/>
                  <p className='to-dont-list__name'>{influencer.name}</p>
                  <p className='to-dont-list__quote'>{influencer.bio}</p>
                </div>
                <ul>
                  {/*{this.state.influencers.map(influencer =>*/}
                    {/*<li key={influencer.id}>*/}
                      {/*<p><span>{influencer.toDont.id}</span>{influencer.toDont.rule}</p>*/}
                    {/*</li>     */}
                  {/*)}*/}
                </ul>
              </div>)}
          </div>
        </td>
      </tr>

currently, i need to display the user description of the one thats clicked. How do i achieve that? because what i can do now is when clicked on any user in the list, only getting the 1st one to display.

items.title: Using es scroll API paging query data, the query result is always 5 times as mach as the number of page size
items.body:
i using elasticsearchTemplate scroll api paging my data,code below:

 SearchQuery searchQuery = new NativeSearchQueryBuilder()
                .withIndices(index)
                .withTypes(type)
                .withQuery(QueryBuilders.boolQuery()
                        .must(
                                QueryBuilders.boolQuery()
                                        .should(QueryBuilders.termQuery("settlement", false))
                                        .should(QueryBuilders.boolQuery().mustNot(QueryBuilders.existsQuery("settlement"))))
                        .must(QueryBuilders.rangeQuery("createdDate").lte(createDate)))
                .withPageable(pageable)  // pageSize =100
                .withSort(SortBuilders.fieldSort("createdDate").order(SortOrder.ASC))
                .build();
        String scrollId  = elasticsearchTemplate.scan(searchQuery, 60*1000,false);
        Page<OriginalMailRecipientActionDocument> scrollPage = elasticsearchTemplate.scroll(scrollId, 60000, OriginalMailRecipientActionDocument.class);  // error this, it get pageSize *5 contents
        elasticsearchTemplate.clearScroll(scrollId);

it get a scroll id,but when invoke elasticsearchTemplate.scroll(scrollId, 60000, OriginalMailRecipientActionDocument.class), it get 500 contents,in fact,expect 100 contents.

what happened to it..,how can i resolve it.. thanks

i found a rule ,may be the Multiple related to the number of es shards ,when i changed the shards number set to 1 ,it's ok; see example :https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-elasticsearch/blob/81690cd449134c2c7f7a41eb821e668eb9bb8e1a/src/test/java/org/springframework/data/elasticsearch/core/ElasticsearchTemplateTests.java #shouldReturnResultsWithScanAndScrollForGivenSearchQuery，before test 'shouldReturnResultsWithScanAndScrollForGivenSearchQuery' method, i changed the SampleEntity like this:

@Setter
@Getter
@NoArgsConstructor
@AllArgsConstructor
@Builder
@Document(indexName = "test-index", type = "test-type"/*, shards = 1, replicas = 0, refreshInterval = "-1"*/)
public class SampleEntity {

it get five times datas

items.title: how do i get user seesion data and insert it to another table
items.body:
I want to get the user's (currently logged in) email and his/her uid from database table then insert it into another table. I have tried but i am getting blank results that is in to the uid and email. 

 <?php

    session_start();


     if(isset($_POST['button'])){

     $bidamount = $_POST['bidamount'];
     $email = $_SESSION['$u_email'];
     $uid = $_SESSION['$u_uid'];

         echo "can't submit blank fields";
     }

         header ("Location: ../Afterlogin.php?action=success");

         die("OOPPS! query failed".mysqli_error($connection));

items.title: Why use bundled code as entry point in package.json?
items.body:
I've noticed a trend of package.json files that have a main value pointing to a dist/ folder, for example:

{
  "name": "foo",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "main": "dist/foo.js"
}

(where dist/ is usually the output of a build tool such as Webpack)

I usually expect main to be the source entry point, something like src/index.js.

What's the rationale for using bundled code as an entry point? Doesn't this get complicate dependency management, since another library that consumes foo doesn't necessarily know what's been included in dist/foo.js? (It could its own dependencies, or it might not.)

items.body_markdown:
I have a a column in my numpy array which has a bunch of `long`s and a few `NaN`s. There are no other `float`s in it. If I convert the entire column to `float` I will lose precision.

If I don't convert the entire column to `float`, I cannot use numpy functions like `isnan` or `isfinite` because the array is of type object despite the elements being valid types. 

Is there anyway of preserving precision while being able to use numpy functions?



    a = np.array([10**50,19**50,float('NaN')])

    a
    #outputs:
    array([100000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000L,
       8663234049605954426644038200675212212900743262211018069459689001L,
       nan], dtype=object)

    np.isnan(a)

    #outputs error:

    ufunc 'isnan' not supported for the input types, and the inputs could not be safely 
    coerced to any supported types according to the casting rule ''safe''
items.title: Using numpy functions when dtype is object
items.body:
I have a a column in my numpy array which has a bunch of longs and a few NaNs. There are no other floats in it. If I convert the entire column to float I will lose precision.

If I don't convert the entire column to float, I cannot use numpy functions like isnan or isfinite because the array is of type object despite the elements being valid types.

Is there anyway of preserving precision while being able to use numpy functions?

a = np.array([10**50,19**50,float('NaN')])

a
#outputs:
array([100000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000L,
   8663234049605954426644038200675212212900743262211018069459689001L,
   nan], dtype=object)

np.isnan(a)

#outputs error:

ufunc 'isnan' not supported for the input types, and the inputs could not be safely 
coerced to any supported types according to the casting rule ''safe''

items.title: Returning and displaying input from Objecy Array in Java
items.body:
Cant figure out how to return the user input from the Object[] to use in other parts of the program. The dialog/input box shows up and prompts the user for input but I cannot figure out how to display or use that input for further operations. 

    JTextField userGrade1 = new JTextField();
    JTextField userGrade2 = new JTextField();
    JTextField userGrade3 = new JTextField();
    JTextField userGrade4 = new JTextField();
    JTextField userGrade5 = new JTextField();


    Object[] userGrades = {
            "Test Score 1", userGrade1,
            "Test Score 2", userGrade2,
            "Test Score 3", userGrade3,
            "Test Score 4", userGrade4,
            "Test Score 5", userGrade5,
    };

    JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(null, userGrades, "Enter your 5 Test           Scores", JOptionPane.OK_CANCEL_OPTION);

items.body_markdown:
I am working on an [ionic app][1], and I would like to use [ionic pro monitoring][2] for that, which works perfect if I open my app in a browser (`ionic serve --lab`) but it does not work for me if I open it with the [ionic dev app][3] or the [ionic view][4] app?

Is this a bug or is ionic pro montoring not designed for that usage?


----------

**UPDATE:**

I have these troubles only on ios, it works on android!

----------


Thanks in advance for any advice


  [1]: https://ionicframework.com/
  [2]: https://ionicframework.com/docs/pro/monitoring/
  [3]: https://ionicframework.com/docs/pro/devapp/
  [4]: https://ionicframework.com/pro/view
items.title: Ionic Pro Montoring not working with Ionic DevApp
items.body:
I am working on an ionic app, and I would like to use ionic pro monitoring for that, which works perfect if I open my app in a browser (ionic serve --lab) but it does not work for me if I open it with the ionic dev app or the ionic view app?

Is this a bug or is ionic pro montoring not designed for that usage?

UPDATE:

I have these troubles only on ios, it works on android!

Thanks in advance for any advice

items.title: Inherited @Component @Path 404 Not Found
items.body:
I'm having an issue with inherited components in Spring in combination with JAX-RS. I'm trying to extend an existing component by overriding and adding some methods, but when I try to call these methods from the front-end, I get a 404 response...

Example super class:

@Path("/superclass")
@Component
@ConditionalOnProperty(name="subclass.enabled", havingValue="false")
class public SuperClass {

    @GET
    @Path("/method")
    @Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
    public String methodToOverride() {...}
}

Example sub class:

@Path("/superclass")
@Component
@ConditionalOnProperty(name="subclass.enabled", havingValue="true")
class public SuperClass {

    @Override
    @GET
    @Path("/method")
    @Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
    public String methodToOverride() {...}

    @GET
    @Path("/new/method")
    @Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
    public String specificMethod() {...}
}

When subclass.enabled=true is part of the application.properties the correct component is created (I checked this by means of @PostConstruct) but when I try to call /superclass/new/method the response is a 404 Not Found response. The call to /superclass/method works just fine and goes into the right method (the one of the subclass).

Anyone any idea to resolve this problem? I'm completely lost on how this can be solved and tried many things... Also tried it with an @Bean solution, but then some parts of the super class were not instantiated...

items.title: C# Null Conditional Operator inside method argument
items.body:
I have following methods:

float myMethod(MyObject[][] myList) 
{
      float a = 0;
      if (myListProcessingMethod(myList?.Where(x => x.mySatisfiedCondition()).ToList()))
      {
            a = 5;
      }
      return a;
}

bool myListProcessingMethod(List<MyObject[]> myList)
{
      bool isSuccess = false;
      if (myList.Any())
      {
            isSuccess = true;
      }
      return isSuccess;
}

I consider this condition:

if (myListProcessingMethod(myList?.Where(x => x.mySatisfiedCondition()).ToList()))

I refactor my condition to:

if (myList?.Length != 0)
{
      if (myListProcessingMethod(myList.Where(x => x.mySatisfiedCondition()).ToList()))
      {
            a = 5;
      }
}

Is this two conditions are equivalent? What is equivalent condition to first NullConditionOperator in traditional way? What is equivalent condition to second traditional checking using NullConditionalOperator?

</f:view>

items.body_markdown:
I've gotten this error and another except instead of 'interpolation' it complained about 'image' (when I removed some image augmentation). I found that simply running my code again and again (without changes) it sometimes works and sometimes doesn't. The error appears only after the last epoch.

To elaborate a bit:
I'm building a simple CNN to classify cats and dog images.
This is my python code, apart from that there is only a dataset folder containing training and test folders and images.

    from keras.models import Sequential
    from keras.layers import Convolution2D
    from keras.layers import MaxPooling2D
    from keras.layers import Flatten
    from keras.layers import Dense
    from keras.layers import Dropout
    
    # init cnn
    classifier = Sequential()
    # Convolution Layers and Maxpooling 
    classifier.add(Convolution2D(64, 3, 3, input_shape=(64, 64, 3), activation = 'relu'))
    classifier.add(MaxPooling2D(pool_size=(2,2)))
    
    # Flattening (Step 3)
    classifier.add(Flatten())
    
    # Full connection (Step 4)
    classifier.add(Dense(output_dim = 128, activation = 'relu'))
    classifier.add(Dropout(p=0.1))
    
    classifier.add(Dense(output_dim = 1, activation = 'sigmoid'))
    
    # Compiling the CNN
    classifier.compile(optimizer = 'adam', loss = 'binary_crossentropy', metrics = ['accuracy'])
    
    # Part 2 - Fit CNN to images.
    # from https://keras.io/preprocessing/image/
    from keras.preprocessing.image import ImageDataGenerator
    # img augmentation
    train_datagen = ImageDataGenerator(
            rescale=1./255,
            shear_range=0.2,
            zoom_range=0.2,
            horizontal_flip=True)
    
    test_datagen = ImageDataGenerator(rescale=1./255)
    
    batch_size_in = 32
    # folders
    # \dataset\test_set\cats
    # \dataset\test_set\dogs 
    # \dataset\training_set\cats
    # \dataset\training_set\dogs
    training_set = train_datagen.flow_from_directory('dataset/training_set',
                                                     target_size=(64, 64),
                                                     batch_size=batch_size_in,
                                                     class_mode='binary')
    
    test_set = test_datagen.flow_from_directory('dataset/test_set',
                                                target_size=(64, 64),
                                                batch_size=batch_size_in,
                                                class_mode='binary')
    
    #
    # Start training:
    classifier.fit_generator(training_set,
                             samples_per_epoch=8000,
                             nb_epoch=2,
                             validation_data=test_set,
                             nb_val_samples=2000)


The full error:

    Epoch 2/2
    8000/8000 [==============================] - 14s - loss: 0.6378 - acc: 0.6415 - val_loss: 0.6004 - val_acc: 0.6805
    Exception in thread Thread-14:
    Traceback (most recent call last):
      File "/usr/lib/python2.7/threading.py", line 801, in __bootstrap_inner
        self.run()
      File "/usr/lib/python2.7/threading.py", line 754, in run
        self.__target(*self.__args, **self.__kwargs)
      File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/keras/engine/training.py", line 425, in data_generator_task
        generator_output = next(generator)
      File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/keras/preprocessing/image.py", line 600, in next
        img = load_img(os.path.join(self.directory, fname), grayscale=grayscale, target_size=self.target_size)
      File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/keras/preprocessing/image.py", line 177, in load_img
        img = img.convert('RGB')
      File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/PIL/Image.py", line 842, in convert
        self.load()
      File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/PIL/ImageFile.py", line 245, in load
        return Image.Image.load(self)
    AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'Image'

Other Info:

    I didn't set the system up, so I don't know too much.
    Ubuntu 16.04.1 LTS
    Python 2.7.12
    Tensorflow 0.10.0 (most like pip installed)
    cuda 8.0
    gcc version 5.4.0 20160609 (Ubuntu 5.4.0-6ubuntu1~16.04.2)
    cudnn version dont know
    GPU: 2 Titan X (Pascal) 12k memory (Driver Version: 367.57 )
items.title: Ubuntu+Tensorflow: AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'interpolation'
items.body:
I've gotten this error and another except instead of 'interpolation' it complained about 'image' (when I removed some image augmentation). I found that simply running my code again and again (without changes) it sometimes works and sometimes doesn't. The error appears only after the last epoch.

To elaborate a bit: I'm building a simple CNN to classify cats and dog images. This is my python code, apart from that there is only a dataset folder containing training and test folders and images.

from keras.models import Sequential
from keras.layers import Convolution2D
from keras.layers import MaxPooling2D
from keras.layers import Flatten
from keras.layers import Dense
from keras.layers import Dropout

# init cnn
classifier = Sequential()
# Convolution Layers and Maxpooling 
classifier.add(Convolution2D(64, 3, 3, input_shape=(64, 64, 3), activation = 'relu'))
classifier.add(MaxPooling2D(pool_size=(2,2)))

# Flattening (Step 3)
classifier.add(Flatten())

# Full connection (Step 4)
classifier.add(Dense(output_dim = 128, activation = 'relu'))
classifier.add(Dropout(p=0.1))

classifier.add(Dense(output_dim = 1, activation = 'sigmoid'))

# Compiling the CNN
classifier.compile(optimizer = 'adam', loss = 'binary_crossentropy', metrics = ['accuracy'])

# Part 2 - Fit CNN to images.
# from https://keras.io/preprocessing/image/
from keras.preprocessing.image import ImageDataGenerator
# img augmentation
train_datagen = ImageDataGenerator(
        rescale=1./255,
        shear_range=0.2,
        zoom_range=0.2,
        horizontal_flip=True)

test_datagen = ImageDataGenerator(rescale=1./255)

batch_size_in = 32
# folders
# \dataset\test_set\cats
# \dataset\test_set\dogs 
# \dataset\training_set\cats
# \dataset\training_set\dogs
training_set = train_datagen.flow_from_directory('dataset/training_set',
                                                 target_size=(64, 64),
                                                 batch_size=batch_size_in,
                                                 class_mode='binary')

test_set = test_datagen.flow_from_directory('dataset/test_set',
                                            target_size=(64, 64),
                                            batch_size=batch_size_in,
                                            class_mode='binary')

#
# Start training:
classifier.fit_generator(training_set,
                         samples_per_epoch=8000,
                         nb_epoch=2,
                         validation_data=test_set,
                         nb_val_samples=2000)

The full error:

Epoch 2/2
8000/8000 [==============================] - 14s - loss: 0.6378 - acc: 0.6415 - val_loss: 0.6004 - val_acc: 0.6805

    img = load_img(os.path.join(self.directory, fname), grayscale=grayscale, target_size=self.target_size)

    img = img.convert('RGB')

    self.load()

    return Image.Image.load(self)

Other Info:

cuda 8.0

items.body_markdown:
I have a table "data" with the following schema:

    id  date                bw      bf
    .   .                   .       .
    33	2018-03-25 00:00:00	76.2	0.148
    34	2018-04-01 00:00:00	75.9	0.148
    35	2018-04-08 00:00:00	76.9	0.148

I created a view on that table with this sql statement:

    create view eval as
    select
    a.*,
    round(a.bw * a.bf,2) as bf_kg,
    round(a.bw - b.bw,2) as d_bw,
    round(a.bw * a.bf - b.bw * b.bf,2) as d_bf
    from
    data a
    left join
    data b on
    a.id = b.id + 1

which gives me:

    id date                 bw      bf      bf_kg    d_bw  b_bf
    0	2017-07-16 00:00:00	77.9	0.221	17.22    NULL  NULL
    .   .                   .       .       .        .      .
    33	2018-03-25 00:00:00	76.2	0.148	11.28	 0.0   0.0
    34	2018-04-01 00:00:00	75.9	0.148	11.23	-0.3  -0.04
    35	2018-04-08 00:00:00	76.9	0.148	11.38	 1.0   0.15
    .   .                   .       .       .        .      .
    37	2017-04-12 00:00:00	80.0	0.148	11.84	14.0   2.07

**Question:**

While the view works as expected there is one caveat. 

*I've to make sure that data cannot be entered before an already entered date.* 

I'd like to mitigate that so that the initial order of the data doesn't matter and only the view orders the data based on the date to calculate the correct values based on the 'previous' entry.
Id 37 should be the first 'entry' in the view based on date and id 0 shouldn't have *null* values.

How can I accomplish that? I probably can't use the id so the only way would be a join on the date as in:

     a.date = b.date

but then I loose the rolling window over the previous entry because I can't do:

     a.date = b.date + 1
or something similar, or can I?
items.title: sqlite view calculating value based on previous row
items.body:
I have a table "data" with the following schema:

id  date                bw      bf
.   .                   .       .
33  2018-03-25 00:00:00 76.2    0.148
34  2018-04-01 00:00:00 75.9    0.148
35  2018-04-08 00:00:00 76.9    0.148

I created a view on that table with this sql statement:

create view eval as
select
a.*,
round(a.bw * a.bf,2) as bf_kg,
round(a.bw - b.bw,2) as d_bw,
round(a.bw * a.bf - b.bw * b.bf,2) as d_bf
from
data a
left join
data b on
a.id = b.id + 1

which gives me:

id date                 bw      bf      bf_kg    d_bw  b_bf
0   2017-07-16 00:00:00 77.9    0.221   17.22    NULL  NULL
.   .                   .       .       .        .      .
33  2018-03-25 00:00:00 76.2    0.148   11.28    0.0   0.0
34  2018-04-01 00:00:00 75.9    0.148   11.23   -0.3  -0.04
35  2018-04-08 00:00:00 76.9    0.148   11.38    1.0   0.15
.   .                   .       .       .        .      .
37  2017-04-12 00:00:00 80.0    0.148   11.84   14.0   2.07

Question:

While the view works as expected there is one caveat.

I've to make sure that data cannot be entered before an already entered date.

I'd like to mitigate that so that the initial order of the data doesn't matter and only the view orders the data based on the date to calculate the correct values based on the 'previous' entry. Id 37 should be the first 'entry' in the view based on date and id 0 shouldn't have null values.

How can I accomplish that? I probably can't use the id so the only way would be a join on the date as in:

 a.date = b.date

but then I loose the rolling window over the previous entry because I can't do:

 a.date = b.date + 1

or something similar, or can I?

items.body_markdown:
I'm using docker for Windows to launch a MSSQL server. Everything is working fine except for the fact that my harddrive is now full. I've used all the cleanup commands that docker has, removing all images and containers:

    docker kill $(docker ps -q)
    docker rm $(docker ps -a -q)
    docker rmi $(docker images -q -f dangling=true)
    docker rmi $(docker images -q)

This will not remove any contents in the c:\ProgramData\Docker\windowsfilter folder, where there are still a lot of file. Roughly 130gb worth's of storage, without any running containers or stored images.

    Client:
     Version:      17.03.1-ce
     API version:  1.27
     Go version:   go1.7.5
     Git commit:   c6d412e
     Built:        Tue Mar 28 00:40:02 2017
     OS/Arch:      windows/amd64
    
    Server:
     Version:      17.03.1-ce
     API version:  1.27 (minimum version 1.24)
     Go version:   go1.7.5
     Git commit:   c6d412e
     Built:        Tue Mar 28 00:40:02 2017
     OS/Arch:      windows/amd64
     Experimental: true

I tried to use the docker-ci-zap (https://github.com/jhowardmsft/docker-ci-zap) , but running that tool is not recommended so I would rather use an alternative solution
items.title: Docker for Windows cleanup
items.body:
I'm using docker for Windows to launch a MSSQL server. Everything is working fine except for the fact that my harddrive is now full. I've used all the cleanup commands that docker has, removing all images and containers:

docker kill $(docker ps -q)
docker rm $(docker ps -a -q)
docker rmi $(docker images -q -f dangling=true)
docker rmi $(docker images -q)

This will not remove any contents in the c:\ProgramData\Docker\windowsfilter folder, where there are still a lot of file. Roughly 130gb worth's of storage, without any running containers or stored images.

Client:
 Version:      17.03.1-ce
 API version:  1.27
 Go version:   go1.7.5
 Git commit:   c6d412e
 Built:        Tue Mar 28 00:40:02 2017
 OS/Arch:      windows/amd64

Server:
 Version:      17.03.1-ce
 API version:  1.27 (minimum version 1.24)
 Go version:   go1.7.5
 Git commit:   c6d412e
 Built:        Tue Mar 28 00:40:02 2017
 OS/Arch:      windows/amd64
 Experimental: true

I tried to use the docker-ci-zap (https://github.com/jhowardmsft/docker-ci-zap) , but running that tool is not recommended so I would rather use an alternative solution

items.body_markdown:
I have an application that creates a pop-up window, which loads a page which then fetches data from the opening window, like so:

    var globals = window.opener.globalsCache;

However, when deployed to production, this intermittently causes the following error:

    DOMException: Blocked a frame with origin from accessing a cross-origin frame

Note that the popup window has exactly the same URL as the opener, except for the hash. *(i.e. https:/hostname.tld/application/#page-name )*.

Has anyone seen this issue before?  Any ideas on why it is happening and how to fix it?
items.title: Using window.opener causes CORS error
items.body:
I have an application that creates a pop-up window, which loads a page which then fetches data from the opening window, like so:

var globals = window.opener.globalsCache;

However, when deployed to production, this intermittently causes the following error:

DOMException: Blocked a frame with origin from accessing a cross-origin frame

Note that the popup window has exactly the same URL as the opener, except for the hash. (i.e. https:/hostname.tld/application/#page-name ).

Has anyone seen this issue before? Any ideas on why it is happening and how to fix it?

items.body_markdown: Our website is styled with Bootstrap. I'm trying to implement a React-Bootstrap select component. How do I make it into a controlled component? More specificly, how do I mark the selected option. Usually it is with a value property in the parent component. Is this how it works for React-Bootstrap select as well? What function runs when a new option is selected? What are the parameters of the function?
items.title: Implementing React-Bootstrap select component as a controlled component
items.body: Our website is styled with Bootstrap. I'm trying to implement a React-Bootstrap select component. How do I make it into a controlled component? More specificly, how do I mark the selected option. Usually it is with a value property in the parent component. Is this how it works for React-Bootstrap select as well? What function runs when a new option is selected? What are the parameters of the function?
